name: Moon River
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q6600 @ 2.4 GHz, AMD FX 8120 @ 3.1 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 460 / 650m, AMD Radeon HD6570 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 550 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7+ Processor: Intel i7 920 @ 2.7 GHz, AMD Phenom II 945 @ 3.0 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 680, AMD Radeon R9-280X DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 550 MB available space
